HomePage.title: Hair Salon
HomePage.heroDescription: Experience hair artistry at Signature Trims, a neighbourhood hair salon where we bring out the best in you.
HomePage.premiumServicesDescription: Experience our most sought-after treatments, expertly crafted to deliver exceptional results and lasting beauty.
HomePage.consultationDescription: Book a free 15-min consultation with a master stylist.

AccountPopup.title: Account
AccountPopup.loginPrompt: Log in to manage your appointments and view your history.

LoginComplete.title: Login Complete
LoginComplete.heading: Login Complete!
LoginComplete.message: You can now close this window and return to your browser. You should be logged in automatically.

OAuthLoginModal.title: Log In
OAuthLoginModal.description: Choose your preferred messaging platform to continue to Signature Trims.
OAuthLoginModal.chooseProvider: Log in with your preferred messaging platform
OAuthLoginModal.telegramReady: Ready to log in with Telegram?
OAuthLoginModal.telegramInstructions: A new tab will open. Tap Start in the bot chat to finish logging in.
OAuthLoginModal.termsAgreement: By logging in, you agree to our terms of service and privacy policy.
OAuthLoginModal.telegramManualSearch: If the button doesn't work, search for <bold>@{botUsername}</bold> in Telegram.
OAuthLoginModal.codeSentTo: We sent a 6-digit code to <bold>{phoneNumber}</bold> via WhatsApp.
OAuthLoginModal.telegramOpenInstructions: ðŸ“± Opening Telegram... Click "Start" in the bot chat to complete login.
OAuthLoginModal.loginCancelled: Login cancelled. Please try again if you want to log in.
OAuthLoginModal.loginTimedOut: Login timed out. Please try again.
OAuthLoginModal.loginError: Failed to initiate login. Please try again.
OAuthLoginModal.waitingForTelegramLogin: Waiting for you to complete login in Telegram...
OAuthLoginModal.newUserNote: New account - we'll create one for you
OAuthLoginModal.magicLinkSent: Magic link sent! Check your email.
OAuthLoginModal.magicLinkInfo: We'll send you a secure link to log in instantly.
OAuthLoginModal.magicLinkSentTo: We sent a login link to <bold>{email}</bold>. Click the link to log in.

BookingForm.tryDifferent: Try selecting a different date, or contact us for assistance
BookingForm.name: Name
BookingForm.chooseCategoryDesc: Choose the type of service you'd like to book. Specific service details will be confirmed with your stylist during the appointment.
BookingForm.loadingStylistsForServices: Loading stylists for your selected services
BookingForm.noStylistsDesc: No stylists can perform the selected services. Try selecting different services or contact us for assistance.
BookingForm.confirmationMessage: Your <bold>{serviceName}</bold> appointment has been confirmed with {stylistName} on {date} at {time}.
BookingForm.preSelectedBanner: We've pre-selected {categoryName} for you based on your selection.
BookingForm.noSlotsForDate: No slots available for this date
BookingForm.ariaStep3: Step 3 of 4: Select Date and Time

footer.aboutUsDesc: Your premier destination for hair styling and care in Yishun.

Team.name: May
Team.bio: May specializes in creating personalized looks that flatters your features and fits your lifestyle. With a keen eye for detail, she ensures every client leaves feeling confident and refreshed.

concernsView.title: Find by Hair Concern
concernsView.description: Search for your concern or choose from popular options
concernsView.searchPlaceholder: What's your hair concern? (e.g., frizzy hair, split ends)
concernsView.errorLoadingConcerns: Unable to load concerns. Please try again.
concernsView.noConcernsFound: No concerns found. Try different keywords.

resultsView.errorLoadingServices: Unable to load services. Please try again.
resultsView.noServicesFound: No services found for this concern.

accessibility.concernsDescription: Search for your hair concern to find matching services

EditAppointmentModal.title: Edit Appointment
EditAppointmentModal.description: Update appointment details, services, and scheduled time.
EditAppointmentModal.selectDateAndTime: Please select a date and time
EditAppointmentModal.selectService: Please select at least one service

CancelAppointmentDialog.title: Cancel Appointment
CancelAppointmentDialog.confirmWithName: Are you sure you want to cancel the appointment for {name}?
CancelAppointmentDialog.confirmGeneric: Are you sure you want to cancel this appointment?

Error.title: Something went wrong
Error.description: We're sorry, but something unexpected happened. Please try again or return to the homepage.
Error.adminDescription: An error occurred while loading this page. Technical details are shown below for debugging.

OAuthLoginErrors.missing_token: Login link is missing authentication token
OAuthLoginErrors.invalid_or_expired_token: Login link is invalid or has expired
OAuthLoginErrors.token_expired: Login link has expired. Please try logging in again
OAuthLoginErrors.user_not_found: User account not found. Please contact support

Deposit.firstTimeMessage: As a first-time customer, a small deposit is required to secure your booking.
Deposit.refundPolicy: Fully refundable if cancelled 24+ hours before your appointment.
Deposit.trustNote: After your first completed visit, future bookings won't require a deposit.
